thread.title: Rebecca Malope 'hurt' by snide remarks at Lundi's funeral
thread.title_full: Rebecca Malope 'hurt' by snide remarks at Lundi's funeral

title: Rebecca Malope 'hurt' by snide remarks at Lundi's funeral
text:
I have been so broken not a lot can hurt me, says Lerato Kganyago 
Lundi Tyamara was a back-up singer for Rebecca and the two remained friends after Lundi found his own success. 
Rebecca apparently offered to perform at his funeral, but the message did not reach the right people.She did, however, perform at his memorial. 
The singer told Sowetan that she was "hurt" and "angry" after hearing that a fellow musician had labelled her a "funeral specialist" for always performing at funerals. 
"I went to the funeral with a bleeding heart." 
Rebecca gave emotional performances at Sfiso Ncwane, Senzo Meyiwa and David Masondo's funerals. Share
